name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
schedule:
週次	日期	課程大綱進度
1	3/1	Course overview
2	3/8	Ch 9 Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing: One-Sample Tests
同學分享讀統計的秘訣
3	3/15	Ch 9 Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing: One-Sample Tests
Ch7&Ch8 複習考
4	3/22	Ch10 Two-Sample Tests
5	3/29	Ch10 Two-Sample Tests
6	4/5	清明節放假一天
7	4/12	Exam 1
8	4/19	Ch11 Analysis of Variance
9	4/26	Ch11 Analysis of Variance
10	5/3	Ch11 Analysis of Variance
11	5/10	Ch12 Chi-Square Tests and Nonparametric Tests
12	5/17	Ch12 Chi-Square Tests and Nonparametric Tests
13	5/24	Exam 2
14	5/31	Ch13 Simple Linear Regression
15	6/7	Ch13 Simple Linear Regression
16	6/14	Ch14 Introduction to Multiple Regression
17	6/21	Ch14 Introduction to Multiple Regression
18	6/28	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
複習考: 10% 	Exam 1: 30%	
Exam 2: 30% 		Final Exam: 30%
materials: Basic Business Statistics: Concept and Applications, by Berenson, Levine, and Krehbiel, 13th Edition
